title: T227 Baker, Bender and Marquard - blank back types
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T227 Baker, Bender and Marquard - blank back types
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
T227 Blank Backed cards available for sale. These are thought to have come from an advertising piece. The hand cut along the edges seem to possibly support this. Authenticated by Beckett (labeled as altered because they are cut from a sheet). Great type cards at an affordable price.

Home Run Baker - Sold
Chief Bender - Sold
Rube Marquard - $160

All prices postpaid.
